com.symbol.emdk.barcode

Class BarcodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.symbol.emdk.EMDKBase
      • com.symbol.emdk.barcode.BarcodeManager

  • public class BarcodeManager
extends EMDKBase
    This is the primary object to access the barcode scanning feature. 

     {@code
 
        public class MainActivity extends Activity implements EMDKListener,
                StatusListener, DataListener, ScannerConnectionListener {

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BarcodeManager.ConnectionState
      Connection states of a scanner device.
      static class  BarcodeManager.DeviceIdentifier
      Defines specific scanner devices of each type.
      static interface  BarcodeManager.ScannerConnectionListener
      An interface for notifying client applications when the external scanner is connected or disconnected to the mobile device.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedDevicesInfo

        public List<ScannerInfo> getSupportedDevicesInfo()
        Returns list of supported scanner devices information.
        Returns:
        Returns list of supported scanner devices information.
        Throws:
        ScannerException

      • getDevice

        public Scanner getDevice(ScannerInfo scannerInfo)
        This method returns the scanner object if the scanner info specified is valid and scanner info object can obtain from the BarcoderManager.getSupportedDevices(). The scanner object created will be singleton object for a specific scanner.
        Parameters:
        friendlyName - The scanner friendly name.
        Returns:
        Returns the scanner object if scanner friendly name is valid. Otherwise null is returned.

      • getDevice

        public Scanner getDevice(BarcodeManager.DeviceIdentifier deviceIdentifier)

        This method returns the scanner object based on device identifier specified except DeviceIdentifier.UNDEFINED. The scanner object created will be signleton object for a specific scanner.

        Parameters:
        deviceIdentifier - The device identifier specifies which scanner the application wants.
        Returns:
        Scanner object if the device identifier specified is valid on the device. Otherwise null is returned.
